attributes.action: The Abuse Of Children In Madrassas .
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned call for full investigations to be carried out into the child abuse in Madrassas and Mosques in the UK., as highlighted recently in the media ; the perpetrators to be severely punished under the law .
Furthermore , as reported , the establishments are not regulated in the same way as normal schools and colleges . We call upon these to be regulated in line with all other educational ( religious or otherwise ) establishments in the UK , effective at the earliest possible moment .
